thread.title: Brent Leblanc

author: Brent Leblanc
title: Brent Leblanc
text: I expected a truck to deliver these burlap sack wrapped trees and I would have to drape my suburban to carry home but a simple UPS box arrived with 8 trees in it….not possible… yep and they were packed cold and with the most amazing jell on the roots that keep them cold and wet. It was 3 days before we got them in the ground and within 48 hours we had blooms…. They woke up and became colorful. I just did not expect that, now almost 2 weeks and they are beautiful. Planted in 40 gallon pots so we can move them for bad weather and construction planned . Can't say enough great job looks like the bees need to get busy.
